KnowledgeBase.Title: isInexact
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isInteger isNull isZero integer isExact isEven isNegative isPositive isOdd

Function.Description: The isInexact function returns false if its numeric argument is an exact Integer with no fraction; otherwise true is returned.

Brief.Overview: The isInexact function returns false if its numeric argument is an exact Integer with no fraction; otherwise true is returned.
Brief.Usage: The isInexact function is used to determine whether an object is NOT an exact Integer with no fraction. The isExact function is used to determine if an object IS an exact Integer with no fraction .

Syntax.Return: Returns true if the object is NOT an exact Integer . If the object is an exact Integer, false is returned.
